      • F

        public double F(PVector T)
        Computes the log normalizer \f$ F( \mathbf{\Theta} ) \f$.
        Specified by:
        F in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = \theta \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ F(\mathbf{\Theta}) = \log \left( -\frac{2}{\theta} \right) \f$

      • gradF

        public PVector gradF(PVector T)
        Computes \f$ \nabla F ( \mathbf{\Theta} )\f$.
        Specified by:
        gradF in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = \theta \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ \nabla F( \mathbf{\Theta} ) = -\frac{1}{\theta} \f$

        Computes \f$ G(\mathbf{H})\f$.

        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = \eta \f$
        Returns:

      • density

        public double density(PVector x,
             PVector param)
        Computes the density value \f$ f(x;\sigma) \f$.
        Overrides:
        density in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        x - a point
        param - parameters (source, natural, or expectation)
        Returns:
        \f$ f(x;\sigma) = \frac{1}{ 2 \sigma } \exp \left( - \frac{|x|}{\sigma} \right) \f$

      • drawRandomPoint

        public PVector drawRandomPoint(PVector L)
        Draws a point from the considered Laplacian distribution.

        Returns:

      • KLD

        public double KLD(PVector LP,
         PVector LQ)
        Computes the Kullback-Leibler divergence between two Laplacian distributions.
        Specified by:
        KLD in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVector>
        Parameters:
        LP - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_P \f$
        LQ - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_Q \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ D_{\mathrm{KL}}(f_P\|f_Q) = \log \left( \frac{\sigma_Q}{\sigma_P} \right) + \frac{\sigma_P - \sigma_Q}{\sigma_Q} \f$
